rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious hallway designed to accommodate wheelchair access, with a North-facing entrance and Vastu compliant orientation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Bohemian style living room with natural lighting, adorned with earthy tones and textures that follow Vastu guidelines for south-east direction.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a Bohemian aesthetic, featuring an extended counter and wheelchair-accessible table configuration.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet rustic kitchen designed for easy accessibility, featuring wide pathways for wheelchair movement and a north-east placement as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy Bohemian guest bedroom designed with built-in storage, ensuring accessibility with lowered bed platforms and easy-to-reach fixtures.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Bohemian styled master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom for wheelchair-friendly access, aligned with the north-west direction as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious room designed in a Bohemian style, featuring ample storage and clear pathways to facilitate wheelchair movement.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A North-facing entrance ensuring natural light while maintaining Vastu principles; includes a ramp for wheelchair access.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Dual car garage door providing easy access to the two-car garage, designed with ample space for wheelchair maneuverability.

openings.name: Balcony Opening
openings.description: A small balcony opening adjacent to the living room, offering ventilation and natural light while following Bohemian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Bohemian styled bedroom with ample natural light and easy wheelchair access, strategically placed as per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Multi-functional utility room designed for storage and minor repairs with accessibility in mind.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible staircase (or ramp where applicable) connecting the two floors with safety handrails and non-slip surfaces.

rooms.name: Garage Space
rooms.description: A two-car garage designed to accommodate two vehicles with ample maneuverability, including dedicated space for wheelchair accessible vehicle entry.

openings.name: Garage Exit
openings.description: Accessible exit door ensuring smooth traffic flow and safety standards for both vehicles and wheelchair users.
